response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am excited to present our premium product to you. It's not just any item; it's an investment in excellence and efficiency. Given its value to you, we believe it's worth more than $10,000. Considering its true worth, I am offering it to you for $11,000. This is a fantastic opportunity to secure such a valuable asset at a price that offers you significant savings compared to the market rate. Please let me know if this proposal meets your expectations or if you need further details about the product. We look forward to serving you.", "product_price": 11000}
